title: Lionel Ortíz
text: Lionel Ortíz (born 23 September 1970) is a Puerto Rican <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201988%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Welterweight">men's welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1988%20Summer%20Olympics">1988 Summer Olympics</a>.
